stockmarketsim

Class IntelligentTrader

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarketsim.Trader
      • stockmarketsim.IntelligentTrader

  • public class IntelligentTrader
extends Trader
    A trader which attempts to make a profit on the market, rather than by randomly buying and selling

    • Method Detail

      • simulatePeriod

        public void simulatePeriod()
        Simulates a period of trade. The trader will calculate offers based on the state of the market, and update his offers accordingly.
        Specified by:
        simulatePeriod in class Trader
